entries.title: Ben Esposito was tired of ‘wholesome’ video games. Enter ‘Neon White.’
entries.description: “I wanted to do something that was just stupid and over the top and really self-indulgent,” says the game’s creator.

entries.title: Cameras struggle with dark skin. Here’s how new smartphones stack up.
entries.description: Google is trying to make its phone cameras more inclusive. We put it to the test against its greatest rivals.

entries.title: How Dear Media reinvented internet celebrity
entries.description: Since launching in 2018, Dear Media has become one of the most prominent names in women’s media.
